EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Celebrate Your Elite Status at the Elite Eight
We know selling solar in the winter can be a challenge - so we are offering a MAD promotion for our Loyal Blue partners:
Sell the most solar in February 2018, and we will send you to the NCAA ELITE EIGHT East Regional Championship in Boston on Sunday, March 25th.
This promotion is the first of many that we will be offering only for our Loyal Blue partners like you! See detailed Terms & Conditions below.
The Competition Runs Now through Selection Sunday (3/11/18)
Let the Games Begin!
We can't wait to see who wins it all, -All of Us Here at BlueWave
Terms & Conditions:
Sales must be tracked to individual Sales Rep email addresses in Salesforce, no combined company efforts will qualify for tickets Mass Solar Loan sales are not eligible for this promotion Minimum of 5 loans closed to win Loans closed between 5:00pm today (2/12/18) and 11:00pm on Selection Sunday (3/11/18) are eligible for this promotion We will announce the winning sales rep on Monday, March 12th, 2018 via phone call from your BlueWave partner
The second place prize will be tickets to the Sweet Sixteen games in Boston on Friday, March 23rd, 2018
BlueWave will not cover any associated travel expenses to attend these games Tickets will be in the balcony section, enjoy the experience with the real fans!
